709,coin_collector,"this is the present state of the game

Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to make an effort to move east. Following that, move north. Then, move east. Once you get through with that, make an attempt to travel north. If you can manage that, recover the coin from the floor of the salon. Alright, thanks!
-= Garage =-
This is going to sound unbelievable, but you've just entered a garage.
You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east.
these are the possible verbs you can use: ['drop', 'examine', 'go', 'inventory', 'look', 'take'].
What is the goal of the game? ",user,0,709,1.0
